features.name: Main Skin Layout
features.description: Primary skin template with multiple content panes and responsive layout structure for standard pages
features.ui_location: Site > Apply Skin > Cavalier > Main Layout
test_scenarios: Apply Main skin to a page
Verify all content panes render correctly (TopHeroDark, TopPane, ContentPane, LeftPane, RightPane, FooterPane)
Test empty pane behavior and automatic width adjustment
Verify proper layout rendering in edit mode vs view mode

features.name: Popup Skin Layout
features.description: Simplified skin template designed for popup windows and modal dialogs
features.ui_location: Site > Apply Skin > Cavalier > Popup Layout
test_scenarios: Apply popup skin to modal windows
Verify jQuery and slide scripts load correctly
Test content pane rendering in popup context
Verify proper styling in popup mode

features.name: Responsive Design System
features.description: Mobile-first responsive design with breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop views
test_scenarios: Test responsive pane collapsing and stacking

features.name: Navigation Menu
features.description: DDR Menu implementation with dropdown navigation, CSS3 animations, and mobile menu toggle
test_scenarios: Test menu rendering with multiple levels
Verify CSS3 animations (fadeInDown, fadeOutUp, fadeInLeft, fadeOutRight)
Verify dropdown positioning at different viewport widths

features.name: User Authentication Controls
features.description: User login, logout, and profile management controls integrated into the skin header
features.ui_location: Site Header > Top Bar > User Controls
test_scenarios: Test login control display for anonymous users
Test user menu dropdown after login
Test user profile menu toggle behavior

features.name: Language Selector
features.description: Multi-language support control allowing users to switch between available site languages
features.ui_location: Site Header > Top Bar > Language Selector

features.name: Site Search
features.description: Search functionality integrated into the skin header for site-wide content search
test_scenarios: Verify ShowSite and ShowWeb parameter settings

features.name: Logo Display
features.description: Site logo display control with support for image and text logos
test_scenarios: Verify logo link to home page
Test logo responsiveness at different breakpoints

features.name: Container Templates
features.description: Multiple container styles including title and no-title variations with different color schemes
test_scenarios: Test Title_h1 container with module title
Test Title_h2 container with module title
Test color variations (Black, White, Yellow, LightGray)

features.name: Footer Components
features.description: Footer area with copyright information and customizable footer pane

features.name: Mobile Menu Toggle
features.description: Hamburger menu functionality for mobile devices with slide animations
test_scenarios: Test menu toggle button visibility at mobile breakpoint

features.name: Breadcrumb Navigation
features.description: Page hierarchy navigation showing the current page location within the site structure
test_scenarios: Test breadcrumb rendering on nested pages

features.name: CSS Theme Styling
features.description: Comprehensive CSS styling system including typography, content styles, and UI components
test_scenarios: Verify link colors and hover states

features.name: Dynamic Pane Width Adjustment
features.description: JavaScript-based automatic pane width adjustment when side panes are empty
test_scenarios: Test LeftPane full width when RightPane is empty
Verify behavior in edit mode vs view mode
Test with content in both panes
Test with content in only one pane
